name: Space Hawk 3D Battles
description:
Now enjoy Space Battles in 3D

Experience bullets and projectiles zoom by as you dodge and navigate through missiles in this simple take on the space shooter genre.

Unlike simple, arcade top-down shooters,  engage first-hand with eye catching 3D ships, missiles and asteroids.

Destroy ships to earn scraps and purchase powerful, new ships with advanced bodies, weapons, and abilities. 

Easy to learn. Rewarding to master.

Gets harder as you progress, action-packed with asteroids, missiles and fighter ships.

Start with a humble single-shooter to a full-scale battleship loaded with missiles!
A  range of ships to choose from, with each delivering a bigger bang than the previous ship.

Simple and easy to use controls for your space ship. Who said piloting a ship was hard?

Increase your chances of survival and your high score by earning upgraded ships

As you progress through the game, the difficulty of the space battles increase. Becoming a wanted threat, more and more enemy ships come to attack you.

Eye-popping 3D Space Battles that will get your adrenaline going with each near-miss with the asteroids and missiles zooming by you!

Easy peasy installation

Just download the .zip, extract it, and run the Space Hawk 3D Battles executable.

Android Version

Want to experience it on Android? 

Download it from the Play Store

Controls

Simply press left and right arrow keys to pilot your ship.

Credits

Credits for the background music goes to Coyote Hearing.
